participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and sociable, always looking for new experiences and connections.
participant_1.background: I listen to a Fall Out Boy record every day. I am looking forward to reading the latest political thriller. I love watching sitcoms on television. Sometimes, I sit by strangers on the subway and strike up a conversation.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and passionate about storytelling, with a creative spirit and a love for teaching.
participant_2.background: I have always enjoyed telling stories to people. My husband died a few years ago, so I am raising them alone. I work as an English teacher. My ultimate dream, however, is to be a writer. I am a mother of two daughters.

content.text: I'm such a huge fan of Fall Out Boy. I listen to them every day.
They're great! I love their music too.
I'm really looking forward to reading the new political thriller that just came out. I love a good thriller.
I'm not much of a reader, but I do enjoy watching sitcoms on TV.
I love watching sitcoms too! What are some of your favorites?
I love The Office, Parks and Recreation, and The Big Bang Theory.
Those are all great shows! I love The Office and Parks and Rec.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of The Big Bang Theory.
I've heard good things about that show. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really funny.
What do you do for a living?
I'm an English teacher.
That's great! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging too.
I'm sure it is. But I think it would be really rewarding.
It is! I love seeing my students learn and grow.
That's awesome! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love writing. It's my ultimate dream to be a writer.
That's amazing! I love writing too.
We should write together sometime!
That would be so much fun!
